content: I've created a profile of the (STU2) Coverage resource in spreadsheet format, and want to have a search parameter on Coverage.subscriber. However, the searchParameters.json file doesn't have the Xpath appropriately generated, although it has most everything else. I'm not sure what I'm doing wrong. I suspect @Lloyd McKenzie or @Grahame Grieve might be able to tell me how to create a customer search parameter, or that someone might be able to point me to a spreadsheet based profile where this has been done and which generates the appropriate Xpath.
have a look at the Argonaut and daf profiles - they include custom search parameters
